message.content:
Explore the SPLICE project at /Users/imorgado/SPLICE to find all version numbers.

Check these specific files and extract the EXACT version values:
1. splice-backend/package.json - "version" field
2. splice-website/package.json - "version" field
3. splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml - ExtensionBundleVersion attribute
4. splice-cep/panel/js/config.js - VERSION field in SPLICE_CONFIG
5. splice-cep/jsx/hostScript.jsx - SPLICE_VERSION variable
6. splice-plugin/manifest.json - version field

Report whether all versions are 6.0.3 or if there are mismatches. List each file with its current version.

content.text: I'll systematically check all version numbers in the SPLICE project. Let me search for these files and extract the version values.

file.content:
{
  "name": "splice-backend",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "Backend for SPLICE - Audio analysis and take detection",
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node server.js",
    "dev": "node --watch server.js",
    "lint": "eslint --config eslint.config.cjs .",
    "lint:fix": "eslint --config eslint.config.cjs . --fix"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@aws-sdk/client-s3": "^3.958.0",
    "@aws-sdk/s3-request-presigner": "^3.958.0",
    "bullmq": "^5.66.3",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "dotenv": "^16.4.5",
    "express": "^4.21.0",
    "fast-xml-parser": "^5.3.3",
    "groq-sdk": "^0.8.0",
    "helmet": "^8.1.0",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.3",
    "openai": "^4.73.0",
    "pg": "^8.16.3",
    "stripe": "^20.1.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "eslint": "^9.39.2"
  }
}

file.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.2"
                   Version="7.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.2"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="14.0"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-insecure-localhost</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

content.content:
1→/**
     2→ * SPLICE CEP Host Script
     3→ * ExtendScript for Premiere Pro
     4→ *
     5→ * Provides all Premiere Pro API functions called via jsx.evalScript()
     6→ * Based on proven patterns from FireCut and SPLICE UXP builder
     7→ */
     8→
     9→// ============================================================================
    10→// GLOBAL CONSTANTS & STATE
    11→// ============================================================================
    12→var SPLICE_VERSION = "6.0.2";
    13→var TICKS_PER_SECOND = 254016000000;
    14→var time_tolerance = 0.01; // 10ms tolerance for clip matching
    15→var temp_bin = null;
    16→var sequence_default_timecode = null;
    17→
    18→// Color label indices (Premiere Pro standard)
    19→var COLOR_LABELS = {
    20→    NONE: 0,
    21→    VIOLET: 1,
    22→    IRIS: 2,
    23→    CARIBBEAN: 3,
    24→    LAVENDER: 4,
    25→    CERULEAN: 5,
    26→    FOREST: 6,
    27→    ROSE: 7,
    28→    MANGO: 8,
    29→    PURPLE: 9,
    30→    BLUE: 10,
    31→    TEAL: 11,
    32→    MAGENTA: 12,
    33→    TAN: 13,
    34→    GREEN: 14,
    35→    BROWN: 15,
    36→    YELLOW: 16
    37→};
    38→
    39→// Segment type to color mapping
    40→var SEGMENT_COLORS = {
    41→    speech: COLOR_LABELS.FOREST,
    42→    take: COLOR_LABELS.LAVENDER,
    43→    best_take: COLOR_LABELS.CERULEAN,
    44→    silence: COLOR_LABELS.VIOLET,
    45→    wide_shot: COLOR_LABELS.YELLOW,
    46→    speaker_a: COLOR_LABELS.MANGO,
    47→    speaker_b: COLOR_LABELS.CARIBBEAN
    48→};
    49→
    50→// Timecode display formats
    51→var TIMECODES = {
    52→    TIMEDISPLAY_Frames: 4
    53→};
    54→
    55→// Translation map for localized effect names
    56→var translations = {
    57→    "Motion": ["Motion", "Mouvement", "Bewegung", "Movimiento", "Movimento"],
    58→    "Transform": ["Transform", "Transformation", "Transformieren", "Transformar"],
    59→    "Scale": ["Scale", "Echelle", "Skalierung", "Escala"],
    60→    "Scale Height": ["Scale Height", "Hauteur de l'echelle", "Skalierungshoehe"],
    61→    "Scale Width": ["Scale Width", "Largeur de l'echelle", "Skalierungsbreite"],
    62→    "Position": ["Position", "Posicion", "Posicao"],
    63→    "Anchor Point": ["Anchor Point", "Point d'ancrage", "Ankerpunkt"],
    64→    "Rotation": ["Rotation", "Rotacion", "Rotacao"],
    65→    "Opacity": ["Opacity", "Opacite", "Deckkraft", "Opacidad"]
    66→};
    67→
    68→// Project item types
    69→var project_item_type = {
    70→    "clip": 1,
    71→    "bin": 2,
    72→    "root": 3,
    73→    "file": 4
    74→};
    75→
    76→// ============================================================================
    77→// INITIALIZATION
    78→// ============================================================================
    79→
    80→/**
    81→ * Check if QE (Quality Engine) DOM is available
    82→ * QE provides extended functionality not available in standard DOM
    83→ */
    84→function isQEAvailable() {
    85→    try {
    86→        return typeof qe !== 'undefined' && qe !== null && qe.project;
    87→    } catch (e) {
    88→        return false;
    89→    }
    90→}
    91→
    92→/**
    93→ * Enable QE DOM if not already enabled
    94→ * @returns {boolean} true if QE is now available
    95→ */
    96→function enableQE() {
    97→    try {
    98→        if (isQEAvailable()) return true;
    99→        app.enableQE();
   100→        return isQEAvailable();

content.text:
Perfect! I now have all the version information. Let me compile the results:

## SPLICE Project Version Report

I've checked all version numbers in the SPLICE project. Here are the findings:

| File | Current Version | Expected (6.0.3) | Status |
|------|-----------------|------------------|--------|
| `splice-backend/package.json` | 0.1.0 | 6.0.3 | MISMATCH |
